row.process: :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :DEFINE &OS_SLASH#, string :SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" @echo off :SET &OS_SLASH# = "\" :CASE "UNIX" :SET &OS_SLASH# = "/" :OTHER :ENDSWITCH :SET &pos# = STR_FIND_REV(&UC4RB_SMD_RENAME_FILE#, &OS_SLASH#) :SET &directory# = MID(&UC4RB_SMD_RENAME_FILE#, 1, &pos#) :SET &pos# = ADD(&pos#, 1) :SET &file# = MID(&UC4RB_SMD_RENAME_FILE#, &pos#) :SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" cd /d "&directory#" REN *.ori.smd "&file#" :CASE "UNIX" cd "&directory#" ls *.ori.smd | xargs -i mv {} "&file#" :OTHER :ENDSWITCH echo Rename origin SMD file to "&file#" successfully!
